title: [K-12] VR-Based Classroom Management Competency Development Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: A program specialized in classroom situation simulations linked to mathematics curriculum

learning_goals: Learners can analyze response patterns by student type in VR simulation environments and apply at least three appropriate classroom management strategies.
Learners resolve conflict situations in virtual classrooms (e.g., class disruption, group discussion coordination) with over 80% effectiveness.
Learners achieve an interaction satisfaction score of 4.0/5.0 or higher during role-play evaluations with peer teachers using the ENGAGEVR platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
